Welcome to Mumara App Store, it started after the immense success of the Self-Hosted edition of Mumara Email, largely accepted worldwide.

When the subscription for the client accounts increases for an ESP, the admin would need a team of people to help in providing the assistance, performing several administrative tasks and provide proactive support to the clients. Support user is the way admin can add these support staff members by providing them permission to perform desired administrative tasks, provide timely support to the client accounts and for round the clock monitoring of the sending stream to ensure sustainable email delivery.

With one application, MumaraESP offers the ability to operate on different levels. All these levels are centrally controlled but separately accessed and managed. You have the main admin side of application with its set of functionality, the second level is the feature rich client side portal and the third an entire separate interface and controls for the support users. The admin side can add as many support users to help him performing several tasks.

When operating as a service provider, you certainly donâ€™t want the software to appear belonging to a 3rd party. MumaraESP offers you the freedom to visually adapt the software by modifying the labels. Rebrand the application, use your own company name, label, logo and favicon to make the software appear as your own.

The admin side of MumaraESP edition is loaded with powerful tools and parental settings to set forth the controls for the application to function according to the preferences. Apart from the settings to fine tune the individual modules, the admin is offered with a good deal of application level settings and sending limit control options.
